title.narrative: Forests for Livelihood Improvement in the Central Highlands (Sector Loan)

description.narrative: The Project objectives and activities include: (i) formulating technically sound and socially relevant SFM plans for over 3 million ha of natural forests and plantations on bare land. SFM plan preparation will include (a) delineating forest conservation and use zones, (b) rationalizing Government's and stakeholders' roles and responsibilities, and enabling effective participation of the local communities and the private sector in SFM, and (c) providing investments for improving the condition and productivity of household, community, and state managed forests; (ii) providing wage generating and livelihood improvement investments, especially for forest-dependent ethnic minorities; (iii) supporting stakeholder technical and operational capacity building for SFM; and (iv) providing project implementation support.
